text: The company, person or persons furnishing the gas may, if they see fit, on each occasion of the testing of the gas by the Inspector, be represented by some officer, but such officer shall not interfere in the testing.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1103.

1973 Ed., § 43-1203.

DC CODE § 34-1604

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Officer of company may be present at tests.
